definition: to overpower/to overwhelm/to subdue/to check/to control
system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
to lean over/to fall (go down)/to hide (in ambush)/to conceal oneself/to lie low/hottest days of summer/to submit/to concede defeat/to overcome/to subdue/volt

sentences.english: So God subdued on that day Jabin the king of Canaan before the children of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，神使迦南王耶賓被以色列人制伏了。

sentences.english: This hero is upholds justly, subdues the unprincipled person is his only objective.
sentences.chinese: 這位英雄是主持正義的，制伏壞人是他的惟一宗旨。
這樣亞捫人就被以色列人制伏了。

sentences.english: Thus the children of Ammon were subdued before the children of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 這樣亞捫人就被以色列人制伏了。

sentences.english: He was subdued and restrained by the passengers and crew, it said, and taken into custody by federal agents once the plane landed.
sentences.chinese: 起訴書還說，他被乘客和機組人員制伏和控制。

sentences.english: Like a city breached; without walls, is one who lacks self—control.
sentences.chinese: 人不制伏自己的心，好像毀壞的城邑，沒有城垣。

sentences.english: The robber was overpowered by the cop .
This prayer is so full of love it overwhelms me every time I read it.
sentences.chinese: 這是祈禱，讓充滿愛制伏我，我每次閱讀這本書。

sentences.english: Thus Midian was subdued before the Israelites and did not raise its head again.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，米甸人被以色列人制伏了，不敢再擡頭。

sentences.english: Look on every one that is proud, and bring him low; and tread down the wicked in their place.
sentences.chinese: 見一切驕傲的人，將他制伏，把惡人踐踏在本處。

sentences.english: So Moab was subdued that day under the hand of Israel.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，摩押就被以色列人制伏了。

sentences.english: So the Philistines were subdued and did not invade Israelite territory again.
sentences.chinese: 從此，非利士人就被制伏，不敢再入以色列人的境內。

definition: to catch/to grapple with/to hold onto
to run off rebuffed/to fend off/(to fight off and make sb) run off
forced submission/to exploit advantage to force sb to do one's bidding
to subdue/to check/to bring under control/(in former times) what one is allowed to wear depending on social status/uniform (army, party, school etc)/livery (for company employees)/CL:套[tao4]
